00027 /* OSG Helper classes  */
00028 class OSGOperationAdd : public osg::Operation {
00029 public:
00030 
00031         OSGOperationAdd(OSGVisualizer* obj, osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node, osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parent = 0) : osg::Operation() {
00032                 this->obj = obj;
00033                 this->node = node;
00034                 this->parent = parent;
00035         }
00036 
00037         void operator()(osg::Object*) {
00038                 if (parent)
00039                         parent->addChild(node);
00040                 else
00041                         obj->rootGeode->addChild(node);
00042         }
00043 
00044         OSGVisualizer* obj; //volatile?
00045         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node;
00046         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parent;
00047 };
00048 
00049 class OSGOperationRemove : public osg::Operation {
00050 public:
00051 
00052         OSGOperationRemove(OSGVisualizer* obj, osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node) : osg::Operation() {
00053                 this->obj = obj;
00054                 this->node = node;
00055         }
00056 
00057         void operator()(osg::Object*) {
00058                 /* loop over all parents and delete _this_ node in ther childrens list */
00059 
00060                 if (node->getNumParents() == 0) { // oops we are trying to delete the root node, but this on has no parents...
00061                         LOG(WARNING) << "The root node cannot be deleted.";
00062                         return;
00063                 } else {
00064 
00065                         /*
00066                          * so we found the handle to the current node; now we will invoke
00067                          * the according delete function for every parent
00068                          */
00069                         while (node->getNumParents() > 0) { //NOTE: node->getNumberOfParents() will decrease within every iteration...
00070                                 unsigned int i = 0;
00071                                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> parentNode = node->getParent(i);
00072                                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parentGroup = parentNode->asGroup();
00073                                 if (parentGroup != 0 ) {
00074                                         parentGroup->removeChild(node);
00075                                 } else {
00076                                         assert(false); // actually parents need to be groups otherwise sth. really went wrong
00077                                 }
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080 
00081         }
00082 
00083         OSGVisualizer* obj;
00084         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node;
00085 };
00086 
00087 class OSGOperationUpdateTransform : public osg::Operation {
00088 public:
00089 
00090         OSGOperationUpdateTransform(OSGVisualizer* obj, osg::ref_ptr<osg::MatrixTransform> node, osg::Matrixd transformData) : osg::Operation() {
00091                 this->obj = obj;
00092                 this->node = node;
00093                 this->transformData = transformData;
00094         }
00095 
00096         void operator()(osg::Object*) {
00097                 node->setMatrix(transformData);
00098         }
00099 
00100         OSGVisualizer* obj; //volatile?
00101         osg::ref_ptr<osg::MatrixTransform> node;
00102         osg::Matrixd transformData;
00103 };

00105 OSGVisualizer::OSGVisualizer() {
00106         frameAxisVisualisationScale = 0.1;//1.0;
00107         init();
00108 }

00110 OSGVisualizer::~OSGVisualizer() {
00111         delete thread;
00112 }

00114 void OSGVisualizer::init() {
00115         rootGeode = new osg::Group();
00116 
00117         osg::ref_ptr<osg::BlendFunc> blendFunc = new osg::BlendFunc();
00118         blendFunc->setFunction( GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA );
00119         osg::StateSet* stateset = rootGeode->getOrCreateStateSet();
00120 //      stateset->setAttributeAndModes( blendFunc );  //FIXME colored point clouds are hardly visible with this
00121 //      rootGeode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::TRANSPARENT_BIN ); // this one igth be computaionally expensive as it causes reordering of the scene
00122 
00123         /* optionally add some fram indication */
00124         rootGeode->addChild(createFrameAxis(frameAxisVisualisationScale));
00125 
00126         idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(getRootId(), rootGeode));
00127     thread = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&OSGVisualizer::threadFunction, this, this));
00128 }
00129 
00130 struct DrawCallback: public osg::Drawable::DrawCallback {
00131 
00132         DrawCallback() :
00133                 _firstTime(true) {
00134         }
00135 
00136         virtual void drawImplementation(osg::RenderInfo& renderInfo, const osg::Drawable* drawable) const {
00137                 osg::State& state = *renderInfo.getState();
00138 
00139                 if (!_firstTime) {
00140                         _previousModelViewMatrix = _currentModelViewMatrix;
00141                         _currentModelViewMatrix = state.getModelViewMatrix();
00142                         _inverseModelViewMatrix.invert(_currentModelViewMatrix);
00143 
00144                         osg::Matrix T(_previousModelViewMatrix * _inverseModelViewMatrix);
00145 
00146                         osg::Geometry * geometry = dynamic_cast<osg::Geometry*> (const_cast<osg::Drawable*> (drawable));
00147                         osg::Vec3Array* vertices = dynamic_cast<osg::Vec3Array*> (geometry->getVertexArray());
00148                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i + 1 < vertices->size(); i += 2) {
00149                                 (*vertices)[i + 1] = (*vertices)[i] * T;
00150                         }
00151                 } else {
00152                         _currentModelViewMatrix = state.getModelViewMatrix();
00153                 }
00154 
00155                 _firstTime = false;
00156 
00157                 drawable->drawImplementation(renderInfo);
00158         }
00159 
00160         mutable bool _firstTime;
00161         mutable osg::Matrix _currentModelViewMatrix;
00162         mutable osg::Matrix _inverseModelViewMatrix;
00163         mutable osg::Matrix _previousModelViewMatrix;
00164 };
00165 
00166 bool OSGVisualizer::addNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, bool forcedId) {
00167         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: adding node";
00168         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00169         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parentGroup = 0;
00170         if (node != 0) {
00171                 parentGroup = node->asGroup();
00172         }
00173         if (parentGroup != 0) {
00174                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> newNode = new osg::Node();
00175                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, newNode, parentGroup));
00176                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, newNode));
00177                 return true;
00178         }
00179         LOG(ERROR) << "OSGVisualizer: Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new node as a child of it.";
00180         return false;
00181 }
00182 
00183 bool OSGVisualizer::addGroup(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, bool forcedId) {
00184         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: adding group";
00185 
00186         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00187         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parentGroup = 0;
00188         if (node != 0) {
00189                 parentGroup = node->asGroup();
00190         }
00191         if (parentGroup != 0) {
00192                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> newGroup = new osg::Group();
00193                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, newGroup, parentGroup));
00194                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, newGroup));
00195                 return true;
00196         }
00197         LOG(ERROR) << "OSGVisualizer: Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new group as a child of it.";
00198         return false;
00199 }

00201 bool OSGVisualizer::addTransformNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform, TimeStamp timeStamp, bool forcedId) {
00202         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: adding transform node";
00203 
00204         bool noVisualisation = false;
00205         Attribute noVisualisationTag("debugInfo","no_visualization");
00206         noVisualisation = attributeListContainsAttribute(attributes, noVisualisationTag);
00207 
00208         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00209         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parentGroup = 0;
00210         if (node != 0) {
00211                 parentGroup = node->asGroup();
00212         }
00213         if (parentGroup != 0) {
00214                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::MatrixTransform> newTransformNode = new osg::MatrixTransform();
00215                 osg::Matrixd transformMatrix;
00216                 transformMatrix.set(transform->getRawData());
00217                 newTransformNode->setMatrix(transformMatrix);
00218                 if (noVisualisation) {
00219                         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: transform has no_visualization debug tag. Skipping visualization.";
00220                 } else {
00221                         newTransformNode->addChild(createFrameAxis(frameAxisVisualisationScale)); //optionally for visualization
00222                 }
00223                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, newTransformNode, parentGroup));
00224                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, newTransformNode));
00225                 return true;
00226         }
00227         LOG(ERROR) << "OSGVisualizer: Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new transform as a child of it.";
00228         return false;
00229 }

00231 bool OSGVisualizer::addGeometricNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, Shape::ShapePtr shape, TimeStamp timeStamp, bool forcedId) {
00232         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: adding geode";
00233 
00234         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00235         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> parentGroup = 0;
00236         if (node != 0) {
00237                 parentGroup = node->asGroup();
00238         }
00239         if (parentGroup != 0) {
00240                 float red = (rand()%100)/100.0; // some randomized colors to better distinguish multible point clouds
00241                 float green = (rand()%100)/100.0;
00242                 float blue = (rand()%100)/100.0;
00243                 float alpha = 0.7;
00244 
00245                 bool noVisualisation = false;
00246                 Attribute noVisualisationTag("debugInfo","no_visualization");
00247                 noVisualisation = attributeListContainsAttribute(attributes, noVisualisationTag);
00248                 if (noVisualisation) {
00249                         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: geode has no_visualization debug tag. Skipping visualization.";
00250                         return true;
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D>::PointCloudPtr pointCloud(new rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D>());
00254                 pointCloud = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D> >(shape);
00255 //              rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::ColoredPointCloud3D>::PointCloudPtr coloredPointCloud(new rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::ColoredPointCloud3D>());
00256 //              coloredPointCloud = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<PointCloud<brics_3d::ColoredPointCloud3D> >(shape);
00257                 rsg::Mesh<brics_3d::ITriangleMesh>::MeshPtr mesh(new rsg::Mesh<brics_3d::ITriangleMesh>());
00258                 mesh = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<rsg::Mesh<brics_3d::ITriangleMesh> >(shape);
00259                 rsg::Box::BoxPtr box(new rsg::Box());
00260                 box =  boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<rsg::Box>(shape);
00261                 rsg::Cylinder::CylinderPtr cylinder(new rsg::Cylinder());
00262                 cylinder =  boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<rsg::Cylinder>(shape);
00263 
00264 //              if (coloredPointCloud !=0) {
00265 //                      LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new colored point cloud.";
00266 //                      osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> pointCloudNode = OSGPointCloudVisualizer::createColoredPointCloudNode(coloredPointCloud->data.get());
00267 //                      pointCloudNode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::DEFAULT_BIN );
00268 //                      viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, pointCloudNode, parentGroup));
00269 //                      idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, pointCloudNode));
00270 //                      return true;
00271 //              } else if(pointCloud !=0) {
00272                 if (pointCloud !=0) {
00273 
00274                         /* check if there is some color information in the cloud */
00275                         if ( (pointCloud->data->getSize() > 0) && ((*pointCloud->data->getPointCloud())[0].asColoredPoint3D() != 0) ) {
00276                                 LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new colored point cloud.";
00277                                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> pointCloudNode = OSGPointCloudVisualizer::createColoredPointCloudNode(pointCloud->data.get());
00278                                 pointCloudNode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::DEFAULT_BIN );
00279                                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, pointCloudNode, parentGroup));
00280                                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, pointCloudNode));
00281                         } else { // nope no color information
00282                                 LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new point cloud.";
00283                                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> pointCloudNode = OSGPointCloudVisualizer::createPointCloudNode(pointCloud->data.get(), red, green, blue, alpha);
00284                                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, pointCloudNode, parentGroup));
00285                                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, pointCloudNode));
00286                         }
00287 
00288                         return true;
00289 
00290                 } else if (box !=0) {
00291                         LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new box.";
00292                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Box> boxData = new osg::Box();
00293                         boxData->setHalfLengths(osg::Vec3(box->getSizeX()/2.0, box->getSizeY()/2.0,box->getSizeZ()/2.0));
00294                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Geode> geode = new osg::Geode;
00295                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::ShapeDrawable> geometry = new osg::ShapeDrawable();
00296                         geometry->setShape(boxData);
00297                         geometry->setColor(osg::Vec4(red, green, blue, alpha/2.0));
00298                         geode->addDrawable(geometry);
00299                         geode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::TRANSPARENT_BIN ); // might comp. expensive
00300 
00301                         /* wire frame */
00302                         osg::StateSet *state = geode->getOrCreateStateSet();
00303                         osg::PolygonMode *polyModeObj;
00304                         polyModeObj = dynamic_cast< osg::PolygonMode* > ( state->getAttribute( osg::StateAttribute::POLYGONMODE ));
00305                         if ( !polyModeObj ) {
00306                                 polyModeObj = new osg::PolygonMode;
00307                                 state->setAttribute( polyModeObj );
00308                         }
00309                         //  Now we can set the state to WIREFRAME
00310                         polyModeObj->setMode(  osg::PolygonMode::FRONT_AND_BACK, osg::PolygonMode::LINE );
00311 
00312 
00313                         viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, geode, parentGroup));
00314 
00315                 } else if (mesh !=0) {
00316                         LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new mesh.";
00317                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> meshNode = OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::createTriangleMeshNode(mesh->data.get(), red, green, blue, alpha);
00318                         viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, meshNode, parentGroup));
00319                         idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(assignedId, meshNode));
00320 
00321                 } else if (cylinder !=0) {
00322                         LOG(DEBUG) << "                 -> Adding a new cylinder.";
00323                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Cylinder> cylinderData = new osg::Cylinder();
00324                         cylinderData->setRadius(static_cast<float>(cylinder->getRadius()));
00325                         cylinderData->setHeight(static_cast<float>(cylinder->getHeight()));
00326                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Geode> geode = new osg::Geode;
00327                         osg::ref_ptr<osg::ShapeDrawable> geometry = new osg::ShapeDrawable();
00328                         geometry->setShape(cylinderData);
00329                         geometry->setColor(osg::Vec4(red, green, blue, alpha/2.0));
00330                         geode->addDrawable(geometry);
00331                         geode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::TRANSPARENT_BIN ); // might comp. expensive
00332 
00333                         viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationAdd(this, geode, parentGroup));
00334 //              } else if (...) { //more shapes & geometries to come...
00335 //
00336                 } else {
00337                         LOG(WARNING) << "               -> Unsupported geometry type. Cannot add this.";
00338                         return false;
00339                 }
00340                 return true;
00341         }
00342         LOG(ERROR) << "OSGVisualizer: Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new geometric node as a child of it.";
00343         return false;
00344 }

00352 bool OSGVisualizer::setTransform(unsigned int id, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform, TimeStamp timeStamp) {
00353         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: updating transform data";
00354 
00355         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(id);
00356         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Transform> transformNode;
00357         osg::ref_ptr<osg::MatrixTransform> matrixTransformNode;
00358         if (node != 0) {
00359                 transformNode = node->asTransform();
00360                 matrixTransformNode = transformNode->asMatrixTransform();
00361         }
00362         if (matrixTransformNode != 0) {
00363                 osg::Matrixd transformMatrix;
00364                 transformMatrix.set(transform->getRawData());
00365                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationUpdateTransform(this, matrixTransformNode, transformMatrix));
00366                 return true;
00367         }
00368         LOG(ERROR) << "OSGVisualizer: Node with ID " << id << " is not a transform node. Cannot add a new transform data.";
00369         return false;
00370 
00371         return true;
00372 }

00374 bool OSGVisualizer::deleteNode(unsigned int id) {
00375         LOG(DEBUG) << "OSGVisualizer: deleting node";
00376 
00377         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> node = findNodeRecerence(id);
00378         if (node != 0) {
00379                 viewer.addUpdateOperation(new OSGOperationRemove(this, node));
00380                 idLookUpTable.erase(id);
00381                 return true;
00382         }
00383         return false;
00384 }

00391 bool OSGVisualizer::done() {
00392         return viewer.done();
00393 }
00394 
00395 void OSGVisualizer::threadFunction(OSGVisualizer* obj) {
00396         LOG(INFO) << "OSGVisualizer: Starting visualization.";
00397         boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(100)); // Avoid race condition
00398         viewer.setSceneData(rootGeode);
00399         viewer.setUpViewInWindow(10, 10, 500, 500);
00400         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgViewer::StatsHandler);
00401         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgViewer::WindowSizeHandler);
00402         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgGA::StateSetManipulator(viewer.getCamera()->getOrCreateStateSet()) );
00403 
00404         //The viewer.run() method starts the threads and the traversals.
00405         viewer.run();
00406         LOG(INFO) << "OSGVisualizer: Done.";
00407 }

00409 unsigned int OSGVisualizer::getRootId() {
00410         return 1u; //TODO ask the observed scene (for now: 1u is the same as the gerenerated on in the SimpleIDGenerator)
00411 }
00412 
00413 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> OSGVisualizer::findNodeRecerence(unsigned int id) {
00414         nodeIterator = idLookUpTable.find(id);
00415         if (nodeIterator != idLookUpTable.end()) { //TODO multiple IDs?
00416                 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> tmpNodeHandle = nodeIterator->second;
00417                 if(tmpNodeHandle !=0) {
00418                         return nodeIterator->second;
00419                 }
00420                 LOG(WARNING) << "OSGVisualizer: ID " << id << " seems to be orphaned. Possibly its node has been deleted earlier.";
00421         }
00422         LOG(WARNING) << "OSGVisualizer: Scene graph does not contain a node with ID " << id;
00423         return 0;
00424 }
00425 
00426 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> OSGVisualizer::createFrameAxis(double axisLength) {
00427         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> frameNode = new osg::Group();
00428         double height = axisLength;
00429     double radius = height*0.04;
00430     float alpha = 0.4;
00431 
00432     osg::MatrixTransform* zmt = new osg::MatrixTransform();
00433 
00434     frameNode->addChild(zmt);
00435     osg::ShapeDrawable *zShape = new osg::ShapeDrawable(new osg::Cylinder(osg::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,height/2),radius,height));
00436 
00437     zShape->setColor(osg::Vec4(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, alpha));
00438     osg::Geode *z = new osg::Geode;
00439     z->addDrawable(zShape);
00440     zmt->addChild(z);
00441 
00442     osg::MatrixTransform* mt = new osg::MatrixTransform();
00443     frameNode->addChild(mt);
00444 
00445     //osg::Matrix xMatrix = osg::Matrix::rotate(-osg::PI_2, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00446     osg::Matrix xMatrix = osg::Matrix::rotate(osg::PI_2, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00447     mt->setMatrix(xMatrix);
00448 
00449 
00450     osg::ShapeDrawable *xShape = new osg::ShapeDrawable(new osg::Cylinder(osg::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,height/2),radius,height));
00451     xShape->setColor(osg::Vec4(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, alpha));
00452     osg::Geode *x = new osg::Geode;
00453     x->addDrawable(xShape);
00454     mt->addChild(x);
00455 
00456 
00457     osg::MatrixTransform *yMt = new osg::MatrixTransform();
00458     frameNode->addChild(yMt);
00459     //osg::Matrix yMatrix = osg::Matrix::rotate(osg::PI_2, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00460     osg::Matrix yMatrix = osg::Matrix::rotate(-osg::PI_2, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00461     yMt->setMatrix(yMatrix);
00462 
00463     osg::ShapeDrawable *yShape = new osg::ShapeDrawable(new osg::Cylinder(osg::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,height/2),radius,height));
00464     yShape->setColor(osg::Vec4(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, alpha));
00465     osg::Geode *y = new osg::Geode;
00466     y->addDrawable(yShape);
00467     yMt->addChild(y);
00468 
00469     frameNode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setRenderingHint(osg::StateSet::TRANSPARENT_BIN ); // might comp. expensive
00470 
00471     return frameNode;
00472 }
